description: Sites including the Manx Museum and House of Mananan will be shut for the "foreseeable future".
title: Coronavirus: Heritage sites to close across Isle of Man
title_page: Coronavirus: Heritage sites to close across Isle of Man - BBC News
maintext: Organisers of the annual event, which was due to take place at the Villa Marina next month, said they felt it was "not responsible to go ahead" in the current climate.
